name: Olimdal
detailed_description:
Olimdal is a relaxing single player puzzle game. Set in the authentic library tower of Olimdal.

The game is about a little wizard who got himself into a little trouble when trying to cast a spell from an unknown book. Spell made wizards movements affect the movement of the surrounding objects. To break the spell you must find a recipe for counterspell from one of the tomes in the Olimdal library. In order to reach the tome room, you must get pass all the rooms while solving puzzles caused by your condition.



Olimdal introduces fresh take on a simple puzzle element. Movement. With 1 to 4 hours of gameplay players must solve the movement based puzzles and challenges by moving or trying to move.

Olimdal is a simple, yet challenging puzzle game with beautiful interior environments and soundtrack.

short_description: Welcome to library tower of Olimdal, where any wizards dream to get knowledge from. Due to general renovation of the tower, sometimes it can be hard to find your way around the rooms, especially in your condition!

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
